application.summary: Create cross-plataform applications using a Free Pascal

description.p: Lazarus is a free cross-plataform IDE for Free Pascal. The Environment remind the old Delphi 7 likewise some of the components found in the LCL - Lazarus Component Library.
Lazarus is compatible with some Delphi code, so if you have a standard delphi application using standard components (or other with lazarus compatible version) you can compile it with no problems.
Lazarus is free and you can use it to develop open source or comercial applications.
